Heavy Stance

Requirement: A weapon with the Heavy trait.

Propping the weapon on your shoulder and widening your stance to prepare for a full-body attack, you are ready to throw your weight around to blow through enemy defenses.

Pros

Block Breaker

  • As an attack, once per turn, attack with a +3 to hit.
  • Furthermore, if the target is also using Self-Defense, you gain an additional +3 to hit and deal extra damage equal to your Strength Modifier. If you hit, the target's Self-Defense ends.

Armor Breaker

  • As an attack, once per turn, make an attack. On a successful hit, the creature’s Armor Class is reduced by 2 until the start of your next turn.

Cons

Overswing

  • If you use either of this stance’s “Breaker” abilities, you cannot switch weapons or from this stance until the beginning of your next turn.
